title: Parameters for lanelet2 map loader Node

enable_differential_map_loading.description: Flag to enable loading of differential map

allow_unsupported_version.description: Flag to load unsupported format_version anyway. If true, just prints warning.

center_line_resolution.description: Resolution of the Lanelet center line [m]

use_waypoints.description: If true, `centerline` in the Lanelet2 map will be used as a `waypoints` tag.

lanelet2_map_path.description: The lanelet2 map path pointing to the .osm file or directory that contains multiple .osm files

lanelet2_map_metadata_path.description: The lanelet2 map metadata path used for differential map loading
